resources.string: To take photos, the app requires camera permission. Please grant it for this feature to work.
It seems that you have permanently denied access to the camera. Please go to the settings and grant camera permission so that you can take photos in this app.
To determine your location, the app requires access to the device\'s location. Please grant it for this feature to work.
It seems that you have permanently denied access to your device location. Please go to the settings and grant location permission so that the app can find your location.
